001package org.nasdanika.emf.persistence;
002
003import java.io.IOException;
004import java.io.InputStream;
005import java.util.ArrayList;
006import java.util.Collection;
007import java.util.Collections;
008import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
009import java.util.List;
010import java.util.Map;
011import java.util.stream.Collectors;
012
013import org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.Notifier;
014import org.eclipse.emf.common.util.TreeIterator;
015import org.eclipse.emf.common.util.URI;
016import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject;
017import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EPackage;
018import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EPackage.Registry;
019import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EReference;
020import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.resource.Resource;
021import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.resource.ResourceSet;
022import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.resource.impl.URIHandlerImpl;
023import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.util.Diagnostician;
024import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.util.EcoreUtil;
025import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.xmi.impl.XMIResourceFactoryImpl;
026import org.nasdanika.common.BasicDiagnostic;
027import org.nasdanika.common.Context;
028import org.nasdanika.common.DefaultConverter;
029import org.nasdanika.common.Diagnostic;
030import org.nasdanika.common.ExecutionParticipant;
031import org.nasdanika.common.ProgressMonitor;
032import org.nasdanika.common.Status;
033import org.nasdanika.common.Util;
034import org.nasdanika.emf.EObjectAdaptable;
035import org.nasdanika.emf.EmfUtil;
036import org.nasdanika.ncore.util.NcoreResourceSet;
037import org.nasdanika.persistence.Marked;
038import org.nasdanika.persistence.Marker;
039
040/**
041 * {@link ExecutionParticipant} which loads resources, diagnoses them
042 * and stores in a {@link ResourceSet} for use in execute() methods of subclasses.
043 * 
044 * @author Pavel
045 *
046 */
047public abstract class LoadingExecutionParticipant implements ExecutionParticipant {
048        
049        protected Context context;
050        protected List<EObject> roots;
051        protected ResourceSet resourceSet;
052        protected Map<EObject, org.eclipse.emf.common.util.Diagnostic> diagnosticMap = new LinkedHashMap<>();
053        
054        public LoadingExecutionParticipant(Context context) {
055                this.context = context;
056        }
057        
058        @Override
059        public double size() {
060                return 1;
061        }
062
063        @Override
064        public String name() {
065                return "Loading resources";
066        }
067        
068        protected boolean matchURI(EObject obj, URI uri) {
069                return false;
070        }
071        
072        protected abstract Collection<URI> getResources();
073        
074        protected ResourceSet createResourceSet(ProgressMonitor progressMonitor) {
075                ResourceSet ret = new NcoreResourceSet() {
076
077                        @Override
078                        protected boolean matchURI(EObject eObj, URI uri) {
079                                return super.matchURI(eObj, uri) || LoadingExecutionParticipant.this.matchURI(eObj, uri);
080                        }
081                        
082                };
083
084                // XMI as default.
085                ret.getResourceFactoryRegistry().getExtensionToFactoryMap().put(Resource.Factory.Registry.DEFAULT_EXTENSION, new XMIResourceFactoryImpl());
086                
087                ret.getURIConverter().getURIHandlers().add(0, new URIHandlerImpl() {
088
089                        @Override
090                        public boolean canHandle(URI uri) {
091                                return uri != null && Util.CLASSPATH_SCHEME.equals(uri.scheme());
092                        }
093
094                        @Override
095                        public InputStream createInputStream(URI uri, Map<?, ?> options) throws IOException {
096                                return DefaultConverter.INSTANCE.toInputStream(uri);
097                        }
098                        
099                });
100                
101                Registry packageRegistry = ret.getPackageRegistry();
102                for (EPackage ePackage: getEPackages()) {
103                        packageRegistry.put(ePackage.getNsURI(), ePackage);
104                }               
105                
106                return ret;
107        }
108        
109        protected abstract Collection<EPackage> getEPackages();
110        
111        /**
112         * Diagnoses the {@link ResourceSet}. This implementation finds unresolved proxies and reports them
113         * with {@link Status} FAIL by calling unresolvedProxyDiagnostic().
114         * @param resourceSet
115         * @return
116         */
117        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
118        protected BasicDiagnostic diagnose() {
119                BasicDiagnostic ret = new BasicDiagnostic(Status.SUCCESS, "Diagnostic of " + resourceSet, resourceSet);
120                
121                TreeIterator<Notifier> cit = resourceSet.getAllContents();
122                while (cit.hasNext()) {
123                        Notifier next = cit.next();
124                        if (next instanceof EObject) {
125                                EObject nextEObject = (EObject) next;
126                                if (nextEObject.eIsProxy()) {                                                   
127                                        ret.add(unresolvedProxyDiagnostic(nextEObject, null, null));
128                                } else {
129                                        for (EReference ref: nextEObject.eClass().getEAllReferences()) {
130                                                Object val = nextEObject.eGet(ref);
131                                                if (val instanceof EObject) {
132                                                        if (((EObject) val).eIsProxy()) {
133                                                                ret.add(unresolvedProxyDiagnostic((EObject) val, ref, nextEObject));
134                                                        }
135                                                } else if (val instanceof Collection) {
136                                                        for (EObject ve: (Collection<EObject>) val) {
137                                                                if (ve.eIsProxy()) {
138                                                                        ret.add(unresolvedProxyDiagnostic((EObject) ve, ref, nextEObject));
139                                                                }                                                               
140                                                        }
141                                                }
142                                        }
143                                }
144                        }       
145                }
146                return ret;
147        }
148        
149        /**
150         * Reports unresolved proxies
151         * @param source Unresolved proxy
152         * @param containmentReference Reference containing the proxy. Can be null.
153         * @param container Container of unresolved proxy. Can be null. 
154         * @return
155         */
156        protected Diagnostic unresolvedProxyDiagnostic(EObject source, EReference containmentReference, EObject container) {
157                Marked marked = EObjectAdaptable.adaptTo(source, Marked.class);
158                List<? extends Marker> markers = marked == null ? null : marked.getMarkers();
159                if (markers == null || markers.isEmpty()) {
160                        return new BasicDiagnostic(getUnresolvedProxyStatus(), "Unresolved proxy: " + source, source, containmentReference, container);
161                }
162        
163                return new BasicDiagnostic(getUnresolvedProxyStatus(), "Unresolved proxy at " + markers.stream().map(Object::toString).collect(Collectors.joining(", ")) + ": " + source, source, markers, containmentReference, container);            
164        }
165
166        /**
167         * Override if unresolved proxies are allowed in loaded resources, e.g. they'd be resolvable at some point after the model is loaded. 
168         * This method is called only if isDiagnose() returns true (default). If the diagnostic would result in errors, e.g. due to unresolved
169         * proxies in opposites, then override isDiagnoseModel() instead to return false and then explicitly diagnose the model which is fully loaded and as 
170         * such all proxies are resolvable. 
171         * @return Diagnostic status for unresolved proxies. This method returns FAIL which results in exception during load.
172         */
173        protected Status getUnresolvedProxyStatus() {
174                return Status.FAIL;
175        }
176
177        /**
178         * Loads resources, checks for unresolved proxies and diagnoses.
179         */
180        @Override
181        public Diagnostic diagnose(ProgressMonitor progressMonitor) {
182                resourceSet = createResourceSet(progressMonitor);
183                
184                // Pre-loading
185                for (URI uri: getResources()) {
186                        resourceSet.getResource(uri, true);
187                }
188                
189                // Resolving all proxies and clearing all caches
190                EcoreUtil.resolveAll(resourceSet);
191                resourceSet.getAllContents().forEachRemaining(notifier -> notifier.eNotify(FeatureCacheAdapter.CLEAR_CACHE));
192
193                if (isDiagnoseModel()) {
194                        BasicDiagnostic ret = diagnose();
195                        
196                        Diagnostician diagnostician = new Diagnostician();
197                        if (ret.getStatus() != Status.FAIL) {                           
198                                roots = new ArrayList<>();
199                                Map<Class<Context>, Context> diagnosticContext = Collections.singletonMap(Context.class, context);
200                                for (Resource resource: resourceSet.getResources()) {
201                                        for (EObject e: resource.getContents()) {
202                                                org.eclipse.emf.common.util.Diagnostic diagnostic = diagnostician.validate(e, diagnosticContext);
203                                                diagnosticMap.put(e, diagnostic);
204                                                ret.add(EmfUtil.wrap(diagnostic));
205                                                roots.add(e);
206                                        }
207                                }
208                        }
209                        
210                        return ret;
211                }
212                
213                return ExecutionParticipant.super.diagnose(progressMonitor);
214        }
215        
216        /**
217         * If this method returns <code>true</code> the loaded model is diagnosed by {@link Diagnostician}.
218         * Override to return <code>false</code> if the diagnosis is not required after loading, e.g. the model is knows to contain diagnostic errors. 
219         * E.g. it is a partial model with unresolved proxies.
220         * @return  
221         */
222        protected boolean isDiagnoseModel() {
223                return true;
224        }
225
226        /**
227         * @return Classloader for loading classpath resources (URI's with <code>classpath</code> scheme).
228         * This implementation returns this class classloader.
229         */
230        protected ClassLoader getClassLoader() {
231                return getClass().getClassLoader();
232        }
233        
234}
